overview: The story revolves around the character Lan - a 19-year-old girl who is enjoying her last days in Hanoi before studying abroad.  At a cafe, she accidentally met Hoang - her deskmate during high school - now seriously pursuing his passion for music.  Will that meeting bring anything to both of them?

production_companies.name: Gió - Phan Dinh Phung Theatrical Club

title: Giao Điểm Thanh Xuân ( 2022 )
